briefdescription.para: test whether uart is ready to send, 1 ready, 0 not ready
test whether uart is ready to receive, 1 ready, 0 not ready
write char to uart send fifo
read data from uart receive fifo, return data received
send char by uart when available, mostly used in interrupt method, non-blocked function
receive one char from uart, mostly used in interrupt routine, non-blocked function
send char by uart in poll method, blocked function
receive one char from uart in poll method, blocked function

disable designware uart send or receive interrupt

briefdescription.para: enable DesignWare UART send or receive interrupt
